Welcome to Brainly!

Brainly operates a group of social learning networks for students and educators. Brainly inspires students to share and explore knowledge in a collaborative community and engage in peer-to-peer educational assistance, which is made available on www.brainly.com and any www.brainly.com sub-domains (the “Website”) as well as the Brainly.com mobile application (the “App”) (the “Website” and the “App” are collectively the “Brainly Services”).

We have two sets of terms and conditions: Part A sets out the terms that apply to our users unless you are based in Europe and Part B sets out the terms that apply to our users in Europe.

It is important that you read and understand the terms that apply to you when you use the Brainly Services before using the Brainly Services.

PART A: TERMS AND CONDITIONS APPLICABLE TO USERS UNLESS YOU ARE BASED IN EUROPE

This part and the documents referred to within it set out the terms and conditions that apply to your use of Brainly Services if you access Brainly Services from within the United States or other countries except Europe (collectively, the "Terms of Use").

The Terms of Use, together with all agreements and policies expressly incorporated by reference (“Terms”) constitute an agreement between you and Brainly spółka z ograniczoną odpowiedzialnością, a Polish limited liability company with its registered office at: Krowoderska 63B/6, 31-158 Kraków, Poland, entered in the Entrepreneurs Register of the Polish National Court Register under the number: 354511 (“Brainly”) that will govern your access and use of:

  • the Brainly Services,
  • if you purchase a subscription, the subscription services provided under your Brainly subscription plan (“Brainly Subscription”),
  • all products, services, functionality, content, information, and other materials made available on, through, or in connection with the Brainly Services or your Brainly Subscription, including, but not limited to the Mobile Software (defined below) and
  • all purchases through the Brainly Services or other transactions for the sale of products or services formed through the Brainly Services or resulting from visits made by you.

For the purposes of these Terms, “you” means the student who accesses or uses the Brainly Services or Brainly Subscription as well as the parent or guardian who accesses or uses the Brainly Services or Brainly Subscription with the student or pays for a Brainly Subscription. If you are a parent, guardian, or other person who enables a student to access or use the Brainly Services or Brainly Subscription or to purchase a Brainly Subscription, you agree to stand in the shoes of such student for the purposes of making us whole in case of claims, damages or indemnifications that we might properly assert against a student, if not for his or her age.

THESE TERMS REQUIRE THE USE OF BINDING ARBITRATION ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS TO RESOLVE ALL DISPUTES ARISING UNDER THEM, RATHER THAN JURY TRIALS OR CLASS ACTIONS. IF YOU BECOME A BRAINLY SUBSCRIBER AND PAY BY CREDIT OR DEBIT CARD (OR OTHER PAYMENT METHOD ASSOCIATED WITH AN AUTOMATICALLY RENEWING SUBSCRIPTION), YOUR SUBSCRIPTION WILL AUTOMATICALLY RENEW FOR CERTAIN PERIODS OF TIME IF YOU DO NOT CANCEL PRIOR TO THE END OF THE TERM. SEE THE SUBSCIPTION SERVICES. AUTOMATIC RENEWAL. CANCELLATION SECTIONS FOR MORE INFORMATION ON THE AUTOMATIC RENEWAL TERMS APPLICABLE TO SUBSCRIPTIONS.

Acceptance of These Terms

Before accessing the Brainly Services, please read the following terms and conditions carefully as they form a binding legal agreement between you and Brainly. By clicking the “accept” or similar button or tick box or accessing the Brainly Services or purchasing a Brainly Subscription, you agree that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms and that you understand any personal information you provide may be handled as provided in our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must not access or use the Brainly Services or purchase a Brainly Subscription.

By accessing or using the Brainly Services or Brainly Subscription or purchasing a Brainly Subscription, you represent and warrant that you are of legal age in your jurisdiction and otherwise have the capacity to form a binding legal agreement with Brainly. These Terms give you specific legal rights, and you may also have additional legal rights, which vary from jurisdiction to jurisdiction. Use of the Brainly Services and Brainly Subscriptions is void where prohibited. The disclaimers, exclusions, and limitations of liability under these Terms will not apply to the extent prohibited by applicable law.

Children Under the Age of 13

The Brainly Services and Brainly Subscriptions are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from anyone under the age of 13 or knowingly allow such persons to register. If you believe that we might have any personal information from or about a child under 13, please contact us at privacy@brainly.com.

Brainly for Parents

Parental accounts can be linked to a student account allowing parents or legal guardians to see the student's activities within the Brainly Services. The connection between the accounts is made after the parent or student generated a unique link, which was accepted by the recipient. One parent account can only be linked to one student account.

It is prohibited to send invitations to link accounts to people who are not parents or children respectively.

You understand that certain functions of this Brainly Services may only be available to Registered Users. Registered Users have the right to use the products, services and functionality provided by Brainly and the content and information published on the Brainly Services only within their own needs, for non-commercial purposes. Except as otherwise provided in these Terms with regard to Brainly Subscriptions, using the products, services, functionality, content or information in accordance with these terms is free of charge.

In order to ask the community of users for assistance with your homework (asking a “Question”) via the Website, you must be a Registered User. Registered Users must create User Credentials and be validated as members of the Brainly Service. You may ask Questions via the App without being a Registered User. Only Registered Users or Brainly (in the case of “verified” Answers that Brainly provides or other communications) may provide a response to a Question (an “Answer”) or communicate with other Registered Users. The rights granted to you in the paragraph above and elsewhere in these Terms are subject to the following limitations:

You agree to use the Brainly Services and any products, services, functionality, content, information, or other materials available on, through or in connection with the Brainly Services or your Brainly Subscription, including, but not limited to, the Mobile Software, only for lawful, personal, and informational purposes. You will not circumvent or attempt to circumvent any security or access control technology implemented on the Brainly Services or any products, services, information, or other materials available on, through or in connection with the Brainly Services or your Brainly Subscription, including, but not limited to the Mobile Software, or any servers, network or associated systems or physical premises operated by or for the benefit of Brainly.

Brainly reserves the right to view, monitor, and record activity on the Brainly Services without notice or permission. We may monitor use to optimize the Brainly Services, understand what is of interest to visitors, and otherwise to enhance the operation of the Brainly Services, assure its availability, and prevent misuse of the Brainly Services. Any information obtained by monitoring, reviewing, or recording activity on the Brainly Services is subject to review by us or on our behalf as well as by law enforcement organizations in connection with investigation or prosecution of possible criminal activity on the Brainly Services. Brainly will comply with all court orders involving requests for such information.

Tutoring

Brainly may make available to Registered Users a service consisting of a live, online connection with an authorized tutor (“Brainly Tutor”) using text chat via the Brainly Services interface (collectively, “Tutoring Services”). The Tutoring Services (and all content provided therewith) are deemed part of the Brainly Services hereunder.

The ability to connect with a Brainly Tutor shall be shown on a separate field or button, next to a given Question. After the connection with a Brainly Tutor is established, you may post questions to the Brainly Tutor using the Tutoring Services text-based interface in order for the Brainly Tutor to assist you by providing Answers or solutions to your Questions.

YOU HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGE THAT THE TUTORING SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN “AS IS” AND “AS AVAILABLE” BASIS AND MAY BE LIMITED TO PARTICULAR QUESTIONS OR BE SUBJECT TO OTHER CONSTRAINTS (SUCH AS AVAILABILITY OF BRAINLY TUTORS), IN OUR SOLE DISCRETION. WHILE BRAINLY MAKES EFFORTS TO SELECT BRAINLY TUTORS WHO HAVE RELEVANT ACADEMIC BACKGROUND AND OTHER DIDACTIC QUALIFICATIONS, BRAINLY CANNOT GUARANTEE THAT ANY PROVIDED ANSWER IS TRUE, COMPLETE OR ACCURATE.

You are obligated to ensure that the questions asked are presented in a form that allows the Brainly Tutor to provide an accurate Answer. The Brainly Tutor may not provide an Answer if such Brainly Tutor determines, in such Brainly Tutor’s sole discretion, that the Question or further questions are presented in a form which does not allow for an accurate Answer (e.g. the Question is incomplete or ambiguous).

Moreover, you agree to exercise common sense and judgment while using the Tutoring Services and not to disclose to Brainly Tutors any information, including any personal information (yours and third parties), the disclosure of which is not required by the Tutoring Services or may be in conflict with these Terms.

You will not use the Tutoring Services in any manner that harasses a Brainly Tutor or could otherwise interfere with the use of the Tutoring Services. You will respect the privacy of the Brainly Tutors and you will not make any unwelcome, rude or abusive communications or interact with a Brainly Tutor in any unlawful, disrespectful, offensive, harmful or detrimental manner, as determined by Brainly in its sole discretion. While using the Tutoring Services you must not send to the Brainly Tutor any content which may be considered as illegal, unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, violent, harassing, tortious, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, pornographic, libelous, invasive of privacy or publicity rights, hateful or racially, sexually, ethnically or otherwise objectionable. The Brainly Tutor may terminate the session at any time if such Brainly Tutor determines, in such Brainly Tutor’s sole discretion, that the content presented by you or your behavior is in violation of the above mentioned rules.

If you ever believe that a Brainly Tutor has violated the law or is threatening or endangering you in any way, please contact us immediately at [●]. YOU UNDERSTAND THAT WHEN USING THE TUTORING SERVICES YOU WILL BE EXPOSED TO CONTENT FROM BRAINLY TUTORS WHO ARE NOT UNDER OUR DIRECT SUPERVISION OR CONTROL, AND THAT WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE CONTENT OR COMMUNICATIONS PROVIDED BY THE BRAINLY TUTOR. We may provide you with a mechanism to provide feedback, suggestions, and ideas, if you choose so, about the Tutoring Services or individual Brainly Tutors. The form of such feedback mechanism shall be in our sole discretion. By providing your feedback you agree that you are giving up any rights you have in your feedback so that we may use and allow others to use it without any restriction and without any payment to you.

You acknowledge and agree that Brainly may record the course of the session with a Brainly Tutor, in accordance with applicable law. This recording, as well as the Questions and other content included in your Tutoring Services communications, shall be deemed Your Content under these Terms of Use and may be used by Brainly in accordance with the terms and conditions of these Terms of Use, including without limitation in order to provide the Brainly Services. You shall be allowed to access the recording of a session that you have participated in. In addition, you Question and the provided Answer (not the recorded live session) will be available through the Brainly Services, in accordance with these Terms.

You will be asked to create unique User Credentials that may only be used by you. You understand and acknowledge that anyone with knowledge of your User Credentials may gain access to any information, including your Personal Information, you have stored in the password-protected portion of the Brainly Services. You agree to keep your password secret, to notify us if your password is lost or compromised, and to be solely responsible for the confidentiality and use of your User Credentials.

Subscription Services. Automatic Renewal. Free Trials. Cancellation

ALL BRAINLY SUBSCRIPTIONS WILL AUTOMATICALLY RENEW AT THE END OF THE TERM IF YOU DO NOT CANCEL PRIOR TO THE END OF THE SUBSCRIPTION TERM. Brainly offers Registered Users the opportunity to purchase a Brainly Subscription, through which users will receive unlimited access to all Verified Answers available on the Brainly Services for the duration of the subscription term listed on our Service at the time of purchase. Registered Users who do not purchase a Brainly Subscription will only be able to view a limited amount of Verified Answers during a set time period. Brainly subscriptions are available for the price listed on our Service and will be billed to you in accordance with the billing terms listed on the Service.

Each Brainly Subscription will automatically renew at the end of each subscription term unless you cancel your Brainly Subscription at least 5 business days before the end of your subscription term by providing notice to Brainly at subscriptions@brainly.com. UNLESS OTHERWISE INDICATED IN ANY APPLICABLE ADDITIONAL TERMS OR COMMUNICATIONS WE SEND TO YOUR REGISTERED EMAIL ADDRESS, SUCH RENEWAL WILL BE AT THE SAME SUBSCRIPTION FEE AS WHEN YOU FIRST SUBSCRIBED, PLUS ANY APPLICABLE TAXES, UNLESS WE NOTIFY YOU AT LEAST 10 DAYS PRIOR TO THE END OF YOUR CURRENT TERM THAT THE SUBSCRIPTION FEE WILL INCREASE. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOUR SUBSCRIPTION IS SUBJECT TO AUTOMATIC RENEWALS AND YOU CONSENT TO AND ACCEPT RESPONSIBILITY FOR ALL RECURRING CHARGES TO YOUR CREDIT OR DEBIT CARD (OR OTHER PAYMENT METHOD, AS APPLICABLE) BASED ON THIS AUTOMATIC RENEWAL FEATURE WITHOUT FURTHER AUTHORIZATION FROM YOU AND WITHOUT FURTHER NOTICE EXCEPT AS REQUIRED BY LAW. YOU FURTHER ACKNOWLEDGE THAT THE AMOUNT OF THE RECURRING CHARGE MAY CHANGE IF THE APPLICABLE TAX RATES CHANGE OR IF YOU ARE NOTIFIED THAT THERE WILL BE AN INCREASE IN THE APPLICABLE SUBSCRIPTION FEES.

Brainly may offer a free trial of the Brainly Services. The free trial period lasts for the period specified during sign-up and is intended to allow potential and existing users to try the Brainly Services. Free trial eligibility is determined by Brainly at its sole discretion and we may limit eligibility or duration to prevent free trial abuse. Pricing for Brainly Services are subject to change. We reserve the right to revoke the free trial and put your account on hold in the event that we determine that you are not eligible. We may use information such as method of payment or an account email address to determine eligibility for the free trial. UPON THE EXPIRATION OF THE FREE TRIAL PERIOD, YOU WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY CONVERTED INTO AN AUTOMATICALLY RENEWING, PAID BRAINLY SUBSCRIPTION IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE TERMS OF THIS SECTION UNLESS YOU OPT OUT AND/OR CANCEL VITING YOUR BRAINLY ACCOUNT SETTINGS AND CLICKING ON CANCEL TRIAL/SUBSCRIPTION LINK OR BY EMAILING BRAINLY AT SUBSCRIPTIONS@BRAINLY.COM PRIOR TO THE EXPIRATION OF YOUR FREE TRIAL.

If you choose to cancel, your cancellation will take effect at the end of the subscription term in which you cancelled, and there are no refunds. Except where Brainly, in its sole discretion, suspends, or terminates your Brainly Subscription as provided below, you will have access to and use of your Brainly Subscription up until the effective date of cancellation. Notice of cancellation of your subscription may be given to Brainly by 5 business days before the end of your subscription term. Cancellation of your Brainly Subscription is your sole and exclusive remedy under these Terms and against Brainly with respect to Brainly’s provision of the Brainly Subscription.

You agree to pay Brainly the fees for your Brainly Subscription and authorize Brainly (through its third-party payment processor) to (i) charge these fees to the credit card or other payment method, and (ii) automatically renew the charges for the duration of your Brainly Subscription unless you cancel your Subscription as described above, which you may do at any time. If your credit card or other payment method is invalid for any reason, charged back, or if we do not receive payment, we reserve the right to cancel your Brainly Subscription immediately.

All descriptions of the Brainly Subscription, prices, and payment terms posted on the Brainly Services are within our sole discretion and subject to change at any time without notice. Brainly may add new services for additional fees and charges, amend fees and charges for existing services, or withdraw its offering of the Brainly Subscription at any time, in its sole discretion. The price charged for a Brainly Subscription and payment terms will be the price and payment terms in effect at the time the order is placed and will be set out in your order confirmation e-mail. Price increases will only apply to orders placed after such changes. Prices listed through the Brainly Services are stated in U.S. dollars, and do not include taxes. All such taxes will be added to your order total and will be itemized on the purchase screen and in your order confirmation e-mail. We are not responsible for pricing, typographical or other errors in any offer by us and we reserve the right to cancel any orders arising from such errors.

If a parental account is linked to a student account, the Brainly Subscription paid by the parent or legal guardian can be shared with the student account. It is not possible to share a Brainly Subscription paid by a student account with a linked parental account. The linked student account then gains the functionality of the Brainly Subscription paid for by the parental account. All rights and obligations arising from these Terms with respect to the Brainly Subscription may only be exercised by the owner of the account from which the Brainly Subscription was paid.

Brainly uses third-party payment processing services provided by Stripe Payments Europe, Ltd. and Zuora, Inc. (https://www.zuora.com/) (collectively “Payment Processors”), to process payments and other monetary transactions made on and through the Brainly Services. Payment must be received by either of the Payment Processors before our acceptance of an order. Payment Processors accept the payment methods listed below, which may be amended by Payment Processors in their sole discretion. Typically, though not always, the information used for interest-based advertising is collected through cookies or similar tracking technologies. We and our third party partners use this information to make the advertisements you see online more relevant to your interests, as well as to provide advertising-related services such as reporting, attribution, analytics and market research."
points.quoteText:
We participate in interest-based advertising and use third party advertising companies to serve you targeted advertisements based on your online browsing history and your interests.
 We permit third party online advertising networks, social media companies and other third party services, to collect, information about your use of our Service over time so that they may play or display ads on our Service, on other websites, apps or services you may use, and on other devices you may use.
Typically, though not always, the information used for interest-based advertising is collected through cookies or similar tracking technologies.
We may share a common account identifier (such as an email address or user ID) or hashed data with our third party advertising partners to help identify you across devices.
We and our third party partners use this information to make the advertisements you see online more relevant to your interests, as well as to provide advertising-related services such as reporting, attribution, analytics and market research.

points.title: If you are located in the EU or Switzerland, you can request access and deletion of personal data
points.status: The Privacy Policy states that, "If you are located in the EU or Switzerland, you have the following rights in respect of your personal data that we hold: Right of access. The right to obtain access to your personal data. Right to rectification. The right to obtain rectification of your personal data without undue delay where that personal data is inaccurate or incomplete. Right to erasure. The right to obtain the erasure of your personal data without undue delay in certain circumstances, such as where the personal data is no longer necessary in relation to the purposes for which it was collected or processed . . . If you wish to exercise one of these rights, please contact us using the contact details at the end of this Privacy Policy." FOR ALL USERS, these Privacy Policy terms apply: "If you have any questions about reviewing, modifying, or deleting your information, or if you want to remove your name or comments from our Service or publicly displayed content, you can contact us directly at privacy@brainly.com. We may not be able to modify or delete your information in all circumstances. To request deletion of the personal information we have collected in connection with your Brainly account, please select the “I want to delete my account” option after logging into your account in Account Preferences. "

points.title: Terms of Use may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
points.status: In the Terms of Use applicable to users in Europe, "We may revise these Terms of Use from time to time but the most current version will always be at https://brainly.com/pages/terms_of_use. Changes will usually occur because of new features being added to the Service, changes in the law or where we need to clarify our position on something. Normally, we will try to give you some warning before the new terms become effective. However, sometimes changes will need to be made immediately and if this happens we will not give you any notice." In the Terms of Use applicable to users not in Europe, "Brainly regularly reviews these Terms and may revise or update them at our sole discretion. Changes to these Terms become effective immediately upon their posting on the Brainly Services and your continued use of the Brainly Services following the posting of revised Terms represents that you have read, understood, and agreed to the changes."

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
points.status: In the Privacy Policy, it states that, "Although we do our best to honor the privacy preferences of our users, we are unable to respond to Do Not Track signals set by your browser at this time."
points.quoteText: Although we do our best to honor the privacy preferences of our users, we are unable to respond to Do Not Track signals set by your browser at this time.

points.title: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.
points.status: The Privacy Policy states, "We and our third party partners may also use cookies and tracking technologies for advertising purposes."
points.quoteText: We and our third party partners may also use cookies and tracking technologies for advertising purposes.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
points.status: The Privacy Policy states that "your information collected through our Service may be stored and processed in the United States or any other country in which Brainly or its affiliates or service providers maintain facilities."
points.quoteText: Your information collected through our Service may be stored and processed in the United States or any other country in which Brainly or its affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

points.title: This service will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information
points.status:
The FAQ page (https://faq.brainly.com/hc/en-us/articles/206193329-Can-I-delete-my-question-or-answer-) states that "questions and answers are only removed if they do not meet our posting guidelines, or violate one of our site rules. Since your question or answer might help other students, we aim to preserve all content posted on the site which can be accessed by anyone in the future who might need the information for a school assignment or project." The Privacy Policy also states that "your content and comments you post to public areas of the Service will be viewable by others on the Service and the public," and that "we may also share information with others in an aggregated or otherwise anonymized form that does not reasonably identify you directly as an individual." 

 With regards to modifying or deleting your information, the Privacy Policy says, "If you have any questions about reviewing, modifying, or deleting your information, or if you want to remove your name or comments from our Service or publicly displayed content, you can contact us directly at privacy@brainly.com. We may not be able to modify or delete your information in all circumstances." Moreover, the right to erasure (which only applies for users in the EU and Switzerland) specified in the Privacy Policy only applies under "certain circumstances, such as where the personal data is no longer necessary in relation to the purposes for which it was collected or processed." 

If Brainly aims to "preserve all content posted on the site," then we can conclude that such personal data is still necessary for the purpose of the site. There are places on the site where answers without usernames or profile pictures are visible.
points.quoteText: We may also share information with others in an aggregated or otherwise anonymized form that does not reasonably identify you directly as an individual.

points.title: Users cannot scrape the website of the service
points.status: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state that, "You agree not to use any automated tool, such as a web scraping tool, a bot or web robot, or web automation, to mine the Brainly Services or any products, services, information, or other materials available on, through or in connection with the Brainly Services or your Brainly Subscription, including, but not limited to, the Mobile Software, for information or to fill out forms on the Brainly Services, that you will not circumvent any technical measures implemented to prevent or limit such access, and that you will comply with the restrictions in any robot exclusion header."
